incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Lycamobile in Germany 262-43

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Lycamobile in Germany 262-43. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio  Flex Plugins Database in US1 Region - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned maintenance in US1 region between 5:45 PM to 7:15 PM Pacific Time on 12/05/2025. During the maintenance window, We would be updating Flex Plugins database in US1 region. There are pre and post update activities around this maintenance and hence this longer maintenance window. The actual database cut-over is expected to take approximately 5 minutes. Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly. Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 5 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights
FLEX - Flex Plugins

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 December 2025 at 16:00 PST until 07 December 2025 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 December 2025 at 12:00 PST until 29 December 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.
